alert.note: Alert for Clallam (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:42PM PST until January 13 at 5:31AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Seattle WA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Bogachiel River Near La Push affecting Clallam County. .Heavy rain will continue over the Olympics and along the North Coast through Wednesday morning with another 2 to 4 inches in the forecast. Rain amounts between Monday evening and Tuesday evening were in the 4 to 6 inch range. All this rain will push the Bogachiel River near LaPush over flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bogachiel River Near La Push. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, the Bogachiel River will cause flooding of State Highway 110 near the Bogachiel bridge...closing the road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 34.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 38.6 feet late tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Wednesday morning at 645 AM PST.
